attributes.action: learn from Iraq and not attack Iran
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We regret the taking of hostages by any party.  We urge the Government not to use this, or any other provocation, as a pretext to attack Iran.
We urge the use of all diplomatic means to resolve the present crisis, and to develop further peaceful methods for resolving future conflicts.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/stoptheiranwar/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
